CHAT.comment: MARCUS SYKES, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM E. MARSH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY B. WALL ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM E. MARSH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 10:58 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
